channel.title: Auger on Sustainable Community Development Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Auger on Sustainable Community Development Hub

item.title: Our 100% Off Grid Gravity Water System
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=my8_4C1x0DI tigercreekfarm Published on Sep 14, 2016 SUBSCRIBE 114 SUBSCRIBE SUBSCRIBED UNSUBSCRIBE Our last extened power outage prompted me to put down another well - one we could easily use both manually and electrically. This was dug by hand using a Seymour hole auger. I hit water at 14 feet - dug 5 feet further and put in my pipes. We have a water level of 5 feet in this well.

item.title: Shallow Well Dig with Hand Auger
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r2ZhwndZrNc Shallow Well Dig with Hand Auger https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uOhwebOEF2E Visit https://emergencywaterwell.com/produc... to see picture testimonials of actual wells drilled with our kit. Very simple, step-by-step instructional video on how to drill your own water well in just a few hours. We hope you have fun watching. You can learn more about our water well kit at http://www.emergencywaterwell.com
